quote: First solve the problem. Then write the code.
author: John Johnson

quote: If you want to build a ship, don't drum up the men to gather wood, divide the work and give orders. Instead, teach them to yearn for the vast and endless sea
author: Anotine de Saint-Exupery

quote: Have the courage to use your own understanding.
author: Immanuel Kant

quote: Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Willing is not enough; we must do.
author: Johann Wolfgang Goethe

quote: Thinking is easy, acting is difficult, and to put one's thoughts into action is the most difficult thing in the world.
author: Johann Wolfgang Goethe

quote: What is not started today is never finished tomorrow.
author: Johann Wolfgang Goethe

quote: Hope is like sugar in tea: even if it is small, it sweetens everything.
author: Chinese proverb

quote: If debugging is the process of removing software bugs, then programming must be the process of putting them in.
author: some reddit post
